hopobject.name: beagle-synth
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.10) Gecko/2009042316 Firefox/3.0.10
hopobject.body:
The beagle synth will be a full featured MIDI synth based around the beagleboard. This project is to be a learning experience with the intention of exploring using DSP for music synthesis.
Initially it is intended to utilize the DSP functionality of the beagleboard to implement a synth with 3 oscillators, low pass, high pass, and band pass filters, 2 envelope generators, and 2 LFO's.
From there the the project may look into adding FM and additive synthesis features.
hopobject.shortdesc: DSP MIDI synthesizer based around the beagleboard
